extendedInfo.description: This is a arcade puzzle game that stacks the falling blocks (bricks) with the same colors. It is similar to Tetris.â¢ You can save game when pressing your phone's Cancel key during game play.[How To Play]â¢ Stack the falling blocks on a specific location using the button 1, 2 and 3.â¢ Blocks disappear when three or more blocks with the same colors are stacked horizontally or vertically together.â¢ The game ends when the stack of blocks reach the top of the playing field and no new blocks can enter.â¢ During the game, Item Blocks will appear. For more information, please see 'About Item Blocks' in the help of the application.â¢ As you go higher levels, the blocks will be falling faster. Blocks of new color will be added as you reach specific levels.â¢ You can hold and use Item Block by the button 'Hold Item'.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Changed my rating from a 5 to a 3 with new update. I liked the older version much better. Don\'t mess with your good rating and change it back, please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am not a gamer but I love this! Thanks for making a great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely Love This Game!!! I only have one fault ... it just freezes a bit but it let\'s you resume ... I would recommend it to anyone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun very fun. Was quite addicted to it when im on the train everyday. The one downfull is that it freezes a few times. But its good we can resume it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I accidentally deleted this game & I took 3hours to find it again. That\'s how much I like this game. M
